title: item sets
body: I want item sets back i need to update my custom item set for zac

replies.body: They're not implemented yet, but it's on the way!  Per today's [legacy retirement ](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/legacy-client-now-retired)post, it's on the way.  Devs aim to have it ready for testing for the next patch.  Hang tight!

With the roll out of this latest patch, which included significant changes to several items, the removal of the legacy client before implementing custom item sets in the new client was a very premature decision. I know many players saw this potential problem coming, so it's not unreasonable to assume that Rioters did as well. 

I understand that the developers are working on this problem ASAP, and I'm not that interested in who's to blame or what caused the miscommuniction (if any). Still, someone screwed up here, and it's causing problems for the player base. This is an amateur mistake, one that Riot needs to be more transparent about and be proactive in addressing.
